speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: The Sustaining of Church Officers
paragraph_text: Brothers and sisters, I will now present to you the General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Auxiliary Presidencies of the Church for your sustaining vote.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: The Sustaining of Church Officers
paragraph_text: It is proposed that we sustain Russell Marion Nelson as prophet, seer, and revelator and President of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints; Dallin Harris Oaks as First Counselor in the First Presidency; and Henry Bennion Eyring as Second Counselor in the First Presidency.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: The Sustaining of Church Officers
paragraph_text: Those in favor may manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: The Sustaining of Church Officers
paragraph_text: Those opposed, if any, may manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: The Sustaining of Church Officers
paragraph_text: It is proposed that we sustain Dallin H. Oaks as President of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles and M. Russell Ballard as Acting President of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: The Sustaining of Church Officers
paragraph_text: Those in favor, please signify.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: The Sustaining of Church Officers
paragraph_text: Any opposed may manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: The Sustaining of Church Officers
paragraph_text: It is proposed that we sustain the following as members of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles: M. Russell Ballard, Jeffrey R. Holland, Dieter F. Uchtdorf, David A. Bednar, Quentin L. Cook, D. Todd Christofferson, Neil L. Andersen, Ronald A. Rasband, Gary E. Stevenson, Dale G. Renlund, Gerrit W. Gong, and Ulisses Soares.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: The Sustaining of Church Officers
paragraph_text: Those in favor, please manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: The Sustaining of Church Officers
paragraph_text: Any opposed may so indicate.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: The Sustaining of Church Officers
paragraph_text: It is proposed that we sustain the counselors in the First Presidency and the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles as prophets, seers, and revelators.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: The Sustaining of Church Officers
paragraph_text: All in favor, please manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: The Sustaining of Church Officers
paragraph_text: Contrary, if there be any, by the same sign.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: The Sustaining of Church Officers
paragraph_text: It is proposed that we sustain Brook P. Hales, who has been called to serve as a General Authority Seventy.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: The Sustaining of Church Officers
paragraph_text: Those in favor, please manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: The Sustaining of Church Officers
paragraph_text: Those opposed, if any, may so manifest.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: The Sustaining of Church Officers
paragraph_text: It is proposed that we release with appreciation for their devoted service Elders Mervyn B. Arnold, Craig A. Cardon, Larry J. Echo Hawk, C. Scott Grow, Allan F. Packer, Gregory A. Schwitzer, and Claudio D. Zivic as General Authority Seventies and grant them emeritus status.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: The Sustaining of Church Officers
paragraph_text: Those who wish to join with us in expressing gratitude to these Brethren for their remarkable service, please so manifest.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: The Sustaining of Church Officers
paragraph_text: It is proposed that we release the following as Area Seventies: B. Sergio Antunes, Alan C. Batt, R. Randall Bluth, Hans T. Boom, Fernando E. Calderón, H. Marcelo Cardus, Paul R. Coward, Marion B. De Antuñano, Robert A. Dryden, Daniel F. Dunnigan, Jeffrey D. Erekson, Mervyn C. Giddey, João Roberto Grahl, Richard K. Hansen, Todd B. Hansen, Michael R. Jensen, Daniel W. Jones, Steven O. Laing, Axel H. Leimer, Tasara Makasi, Alvin F. Meredith III, Adonay S. Obando, Katsuyuki Otahara, Fred A. Parker, José C. Pineda, Gary S. Price, Miguel A. Reyes, Alfredo L. Salas, Netzahualcoyotl Salinas, Michael L. Southward, G. Lawrence Spackman, William H. Stoddard, Stephen E. Thompson, David J. Thomson, George J. Tobias, Jacques A. Van Reenen, Raul Edgardo A. Vicencio, Keith P. Walker, and Daniel Yirenya-Tawiah.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: The Sustaining of Church Officers
paragraph_text: Those who wish to join us in expressing appreciation for their excellent service, please manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: The Sustaining of Church Officers
paragraph_text: It is proposed that we sustain the other General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Auxiliary Presidencies as presently constituted.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: The Sustaining of Church Officers
paragraph_text: All in favor, please manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: The Sustaining of Church Officers
paragraph_text: Contrary, if there be any, by the same sign.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: The Sustaining of Church Officers
paragraph_text: Those who opposed any of the proposals should contact their stake president.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: The Sustaining of Church Officers
paragraph_text: Brothers and sisters, we are grateful for your continued faith and prayers in behalf of the leaders of the Church.
